title: Miracle on Ice was 37 years ago today! | Rachel Ramsey | K102
text:
Miracle on Ice was 37 years ago today! posted by 102.1-K102 - share 
"Do you believe in miracles? YES!" 
37 years ago today, Team USA upset the USSR in the "Miracle On Ice" during the 1980 Winter Olympic Games. This game has a special place in my heart since my Dad was on the team! Go USA! 
"Do you believe in miracles? YES!" 37 years ago today, Team USA upset the USSR in the "Miracle On Ice" during the 1980 Winter Olympic Games. http://abcn.ws/1EFoRf8 Posted by Good Morning America on Wednesday, February 22, 2017 Contact
